pageProduct.name: A'kin Age Defy Lifting Eye Cream 15ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

A revitalising eye cream that lifts the skin and reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

Lifts, brightens and revitalises the delicate eye area. Combining Echium Oil, Camu Camu, Hyaluronic Acid and Vitamin C to lift and smooth out the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and brighten the skin around the eye. 

Paraben and Sulfate free

Skin Type:
Mature Skin

Ideal for:
Brightening and revitalising the eye area
Improving skin elasticity to lift and firm
Smoothing out wrinkles around the eye 

Active Ingredients:
Hyaluronic Acid that stimulates collagen production & improves skin elasticity
Echium oil, proven to reduce deep wrinkles and smooth out skin
Camu Camu extract, a powerful natural antioxidant 
Vitamin C brightens and evens skin tone and pigmentation

Tried and Tested:
80% of users saw firmer, tighter & more lifted skin after using A'kin Lifting Eye Cream.*
*Results based on an independent laboratory self-assessment study.

Ingredients

Water (aqua), Glycerin*, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter*+, Cetearyl Alcohol*, Isopropyl Isostearate*, Isostearyl Isostearate*, Sorbitan Stearate*, Cetearyl Nonanoate, Niacinamide, Sodium Gluconate*#, Sodium Lactate*, Sorbitol*#,Ascorbyl Glucoside, Panthenol, Simmondsia Chinensis (JOJOBA) Seed Oil*, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Seed Extract*, Sucrose Cocoate*, Phenoxyethanol, Behenyl Alcohol*, Arginine, Xymenynic Acid*, Titanium Dioxide, Allantoin, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil+*, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid*, Xanthan Gum*, Mica, Ethylhexylglycerin, Piroctone Olamine, Myrciaria Dubia Fruit Juice*, Copaifera Officinalis (Balsam Copaiba) Resin*, Phytosterols*, Echium Plantagineum Seed Oil*, Olea europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil*, Sodium Phytate*, Methylsilanol Hydroxyproline Aspartate, Sodium Hyaluronate*, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract*+, Salicylic Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate.

*derived from botanical sources, + Certified Organic, # GMO Free

Directions

Pat gently with ring finger, this has the least pressure for the delicate eye area.

USAGE ADVICE

Gently pat a small amount around the eye area morning and evening.
